content: to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb 4x knit to the last 4 stitches purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 8 stitches increased row 7 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the centered cable section keep in pattern purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 work row 6 and 7 3 times total taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2 row 8 rs buttonhole row knit 1 purl 1 yo p2tog work the cable panel in pattern knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb 4x knit to the last 4 stitches purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 8 stitches increased row 9 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the centered cable section keep in pattern purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 work row 6 and 7 3 times total work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row 1 time total work row 6 and 7 3 times total work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row 1 time total for size 0-3 months work row 6 and 7 1 time for size 3-6 months work 6 and 7 2 times for size 6-12 months work row 6 and 7 3 times for size 12-18 months work row 6 and 7 3times and then row 8 and 9 buttonhole row 1 last time 157 167 179 189 stitches you will have a total of 13 14 15 16 raglan increases divide for the sleeves row 10 rs knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 work the cable panel in pattern knit to the sleeves rm slip the 32 34 36 38 sleeve stitches onto a piece of scrap yarn rm knit across the back rm slip the sleeve 32 34 36 38 stitches onto a piece of scrap yarn rm knit to the last 4 stitches purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 93 99 107 113 stitches row 11 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the centered cable section keep in pattern purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 12 rs knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 work the cable panel in pattern knit to last 4 stitches purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 repeat row 11 and 12 until the body of the sweater measures 5 7 9 10 inches from the underarm end after working row 3 5 or 7 of the chart edging stop the centered cable chart row 13 ws knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 14 rs knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 work row 13 and 14 2 times total bind off in pattern sleeves note - work each sleeve separately in the round and place
